name: Tales of Frankeinstein
description:
Puzzle game made in less than two days for the Island Jam where you need to chose monster's parts to defeat each boss using received ability.
Browser game developed using Phaser 3 and design inspired in retro games.
Controls: Use your mouse/finger following the instructions.

NOTE: Have several bugs with timing if you select options too fast... but the key concept is getting the correct body part to have the ability to beat each boss.
